revision.comment: if it doesn't support it by default, it would probably be best not to use a common tag

{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Mercury |model=MW300R |revision=v3.x |est_release_date=05/2011 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=TP-LINK |availability=China only |type=wireless router |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9341 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL016AIF |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S28D40FTP-G5 |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9341 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |stock_os=VxWorks |tp_firmware=DD-WRT (req. RAM+Flash upgrade) |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=38:83:45 |oui_eth=38:83:45 }} {{TagLine|N300 Wireless Router}} "2050000172", "REV 1.0" and "1148" is silkscreened on the board. ===boot log=== {{SCollapse|boot log |
